title: There is Hope
author: Ykcul
citation: Ykcul. "There is Hope: experience with Fluoxetine (ID 76265)". Erowid.org. Jan 26, 2010. erowid.org/exp/76265
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

report: After years of depression being an introverted child, I finally started taking Prozac. After A few days I began to feel confidence in myself and become more social and uncaring of how I seemed to others. I understand now that my brain is more balanced and I am a happier person for I feel freed from my own mind.
